bibl.title: Remarks on Weekdays in Late Antiquity Occurring in Documentary Sources.
bibl.note: An answer to the question, whether weekday indications occurring in documentary texts from late antiquity match modern computations backwards and whether they can be relied upon as helpful, reliable evidence for establishing the precise date of incompletely preserved documents. The earliest attestations of such weekday indications come from the early third century A.D.
WORP K.A., Remarks on Weekdays in Late Antiquity Occurring in Documentary Sources.
